title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Mix eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Fry onions until golden, add tomatoes and simmer.
Add chicken to sauce and cook for 10 minutes.
